info.title: Seagate Lyve Cloud
info.description: This is a sample server LyveCloud API server.  you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Example of the LyveCloud Authentication (used on all requests)

tags.name: usage
tags.description: Everything about LyveCloud Usage -- refer to "LyveCloud Metrics API spec"

tags.name: buckets
tags.description: Everything about LyveCloud Buckets -- refer to "LyveCloud S3 API spec"

post.summary: example of lyvecloud authentication headers used on all requests

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer <token>

parameters.name: X-LYVECLOUD-ACCOUNT-ID
parameters.description: Lyve cloud account id

parameters.name: X-LYVECLOUD-API-KEY
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: X_LYVECLOUD-API-SECRET
parameters.description: Secret

parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: Mandatory - the account name for which to collect the bytes capacity

parameters.name: BucketName
parameters.description: Optional - the account name for which to collect the bytes capacity

parameters.name: Month
parameters.description: Optional - the month for which to collect the per day bytes capacity

parameters.name: PermissionId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the permission to get

parameters.name: PermissionId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the permission to delete

parameters.name: PermissionId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the permission to get

requestBody.description: Permission object that needs to be updated on the store
Permission object that needs to be created on the store

parameters.name: ServiceAccountId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service-account to get

parameters.name: ServiceAccountId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service-account to get

parameters.name: ServiceAccountId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service-account to delete

parameters.name: ServiceAccountId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service-account to get

requestBody.description: service-account object that needs to be added to the store
service-account object that needs to be updated on the store

parameters.name: RecipientId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the recipient to get

parameters.name: RecipientId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the recipient to delete

parameters.name: RecipientId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the recipient to delete

requestBody.description: recipient object that needs to be added to the store
recipient object that needs to be updated on the store

get.summary: get list of users from store

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.

get.summary: list tickets, optional filter by status

parameters.name: TicketID
parameters.description: Ticket Number to get

parameters.name: TicketID
parameters.description: Ticket Number to get

requestBody.description: ticket object that needs to be updated on the store
ticket object that needs to be added to the store

monthly-average-usage.description: Bytes per day of the month

timestamp.description: can be used to calculate last X months

prefix.description: prefix (regex) to hit name of the bucket

policy-input.description: per type - either None or list of bucket names or prefix
